channel.title: Remote Work Library
channel.description: Recent content on Remote Work Library

item.title: Telepresence
item.description: Being present without being physically on the spot? This happens with telepresence hardware.

item.title: Remote Meeting Guideline
item.description: It’s hard to run effective virtual meetings. A remote meeting guideline provides guidance on how to keep them productive.

item.title: Mob Programming
item.description: You know pair programming? Mob programming is similar to pair programming with the whole team.

item.title: Virtual Offices
item.description: Work remotely, side-by-side. With virtual offices your distributed teams work together in an online workplace.

item.title: Video Conferencing
item.description: Video conferencing is a fundamental technology in remote settings. It brings teams close together even if there are huge physical distances in between.

item.title: Virtual Coffee Breaks
item.description: Breaks are important. Taking breaks together with colleagues is also important. What usually just happens in normal office routine needs some assistance in a remote work situation.

item.title: Digital Whiteboard
item.description: Whiteboard sessions are often the heart of creative processes and stimulate team flow. Digital whiteboards help to transfer this collaborative experience into the digital world.

item.title: Online Retrospective
item.description: A Retrospective is an opportunity for the Team to inspect itself and create a plan for improvements to be enacted.
